-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Blaze templates for Hakyll
--   
--   Blaze templates for Hakyll
@package hakyll-blaze-templates
@version 0.1.1.0

module Hakyll.Web.Template.Blaze
type Template m a = (String -> m String) -> Item a -> m Html
applyTemplate :: Template Compiler String -> Context String -> Item String -> Compiler (Item String)
applyTemplateList :: Template Compiler String -> Context String -> [Item String] -> Compiler String
applyTemplateListWith :: String -> Template Compiler String -> Context String -> [Item String] -> Compiler String

-- | Create an HTML snippet from a <a>String</a>.
string :: String -> Markup

-- | Create an HTML snippet from a <a>String</a> without escaping
preEscapedString :: String -> Markup

-- | toHtml specialised to String.
toHtml :: String -> Html

-- | preEscapedToHtml specialised to String Also safeToHtml sounds better
--   than preEscapedToHtml
safeToHtml :: String -> Html
